name: 4AD Dungeon Keeper
description:
Dungeon Keeper

Interactive playkit for Four Against Darkness

Getting Started
  • Use checkbox buttons to generate dungeon rooms and roll dice.
  • Select a table from the dropdown menu and enter a value to look up results. 
  • Format cell colors and borders to draw the dungeon. Take notes anywhere on the map.
  • Duplicate the template sheet to start a new dungeon. 
Features

🧭 Geomorph tile generator

🎲 Interactive dice roller

📚 Quick table lookup

🗺️ Dungeon map blueprint

🧙‍♂️ Party stat tracker
